channel.title: Play WoW.. on your iPhone
channel.description:
What you will need. [*] An iPhone [*] [url=http://code.google.com/p/telekinesis/] Telekinesis[/url] [*] A copy of WoW. [*] Sadly, you will need a Mac
______________________
I'll leave the rest to this page..
http://www.everythingdigital.org/weblog/archives/2007/07/wow_on_my_iphon.html

item.title: Play WoW.. on your iPhone

item.description:
@MidGuardian wrote:

I found this post amusing thank you very much.

Read full topic

item.title: Play WoW.. on your iPhone
item.dc:creator: @MybJames MybJames
item.description:
@MybJames wrote:

[quote=“the fu superior, post:7, topic:121880”][quote author=FastBawlz link=topic=171475.msg1594454#msg1594454 date=1184373431]

Nice tutorial. What i wanna know is how do people figure this stuff out!?

No offence, this isnt a tip, trick or tutorial. All you did really is tell us what we need and posted a link, try copy and pasting the tutorial and under credits put the link.

Most tutorials that were written by some else are usuely just the tutorial and a link to the orignal post. This is pretty much the same thing except it just a link.

why do you repeat what i say but make it look good? A tutorial cant just be a link.

Well it could always be a tip because I gave you a link to a tutorial on how to do it…
[/quote]

it could also be argued that a link isnt considered a tip[/quote]
Instead of arguing about something so pointless, we will leave it here because it is a tip.

Read full topic
